summary: Designed an AI-driven approach to improve change-request risk assessment in IT service management; built and evaluated ML and LLM models to classify risk levels and generate explanations; analyzed large-scale change and incident datasets to surface actionable risk signals; contributed to a prototype decision-support system for early risk detection.

organization: Ministère de la Cybersécurité et du Numérique (MCN), Gouvernement du Québec
summary: Led a team of AI engineers to design, deploy, and evaluate an LLM-based writing assistant for government employees; hosted and optimized open-source LLMs locally (e.g., llama.cpp) to satisfy privacy and security constraints; conducted benchmarking and reliability testing to select and tune the final model for French and English use cases.
